mksinterface.connection.src

Class Mksinterface_connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • mksinterface.connection.src.Mksinterface_connection

  • public class Mksinterface_connection
extends java.lang.Object
    For connecting to the Integrity interface this connection class is needed. You are able to connect, disconnect and execute all commands over this class. For every interaction with Integrity a full connected connection is necessary. The class is singleton because is is only necessary to have one connection for all interactions. Use this class with the getInstance() method instead of the private constructor
    Author:
    ckaltenboeck
